text: Can I use Python as a bash replacement?
I currently do my textfile manipulation through a bunch of badly remembered awk, sed, bash and a tiny bit of Perl.
I've seen mentioned a few places that python is good for this kind of thing, I know a little and I would like to know more.
Is python a good choice for this, and is there a good book or guide to learning how to use python to replace shell scripting, awk, sed and friends?
